title: Introducing: Blank Figures
body:
This is pretty vibey.

**Blank Figures**, the side project of Chase Oros who usually releases music under the Bad Bandit moniker, sort of feels like finding the middle ground between Toro y Moi and Jamie XX, with some killer falsetto vocals thrown in for good measure. Check a couple of tracks below.

excerpt.full: This is pretty vibey. Blank Figures, the side project of Chase Oros who usually releases music under the Bad Bandit moniker, sort of feels like finding the middle ground between Toro y Moi and Jamie XX, with some killer falsetto vocals thrown in for good measure. Check a couple of tracks below.
